This game isn't complicated or deep but sometimes all you really want to do is engage in mindless slaughter. Killing Floor allows you to do just that, in six distinct flavors: Medic, Support, Sharpshooter, Firebug, Commando  and Demolition. If you're looking for simplistic, cathartic fun or you have the overwhelming desire to inflict harm upon something Killing Floor delivers.

This game rules, Waves and Waves of Zombies/Mutants to shoot, very very British Accents with Laugh out Loud results (you will find it hard to resist saying DOSH!) and still adding more content. First of all, I want to say that do not compare this game with Left 4 Dead series, they are completely different styles. Apparently KF seems to be a game that people will love or hate. 

In KF the objective is to survive against “waves" of enemies, with each wave becoming successively more difficult, until it concludes in the last wave against the Patriarch (the final boss). Between waves you can buy weapons, armor, grenades, etc. One of the things that I like more about this game is the "Zed Time”, it's something like the "bullet-time" in the Matrix movies and Max Payne games, you can see everything in “slow motion” for a few seconds, even in multiplayer. Graphics? They aren't the best, but IMO it doesn't matter, unless, of course, you are a graphic whore?

On other hand, I love Tripwire, they are one of the best and few PC-exclusive developers out there, and also because KF was released almost 3 years ago and they constantly are updating the game with free stuff.

8.5/10

Ужас и удивительная музыка, - всегда пожалуйста! Если в L4D2 однозначно решает командная игра, то в K.F. всегда есть шанс выжить за счёт сообразительности и холодного расчёта. Но нужно понять, что "вытащить команду в одиночку" или "на пару" не очень-то и получится без прокачки навыков боя в соответствии с Вашими возможностями игры. Выбешивают невидимки, соответственно выбирайте класс с автоматическим оружием и получайте эффективное обнаружение невидимок. Хотите хорошо раздавать в головы мобов и отточить навык стрельбы в шутерах по головам из разнообразного арсенала - берите и качайте снайпера. Хотите средневековой резни тесаками и прочим - берсеркер. Игра действительно помогает расслабиться.

An intelligent and charming take on modern British science and economics. The masters at Tripwire have once again posited excellent theories and discussed the engrossing dilemmas of today with their trademark unabashedly British vernacular. It is a truly riveting examination of the duplicity of the rapidly changing socio-economic norms and the enduring courage of the human spirit, in response to the modern crisis that Great Britain, and indeed the world, now faces. In addition to the many hot-button issues they have already indelibly covered and thoroughly explored, Tripwire has also appended fascinating content regarding the moral and ethical quandaries of the modification of the human genome, in addition to improvements to our physical and mental capabilities through cybernetic augmentation, free of charge. There is however extra content you may purchase that examines a range of themes from the necessity of violence to the use of anachronistic steam technology in a modern setting.
Мясо и хардкор-что ещё надо для жизни?))обязательно для ознакомления!

Казалось бы, как эта игра может быть круче более распиаренной и богатой Left 4 Dead? А вот может! Здесь вам и действительно пугающая атмосфера, и множесто (тысячи) различных карт, несколько классов и сотни видов оружия. И лишь командная работа поможет справится с врагами, которые, между прочем, убивают достаточно быстро - главное только упустить парочку тварей из виду. Не смотрите на графику - не за это мы людим Killing Floor

明らかにL4Dに影響受けたゾンビCOOPサバイバルゲームなんだけど、RPG的な要素を加えた、サバイバルを楽しむというよりゾンビを殺しまくるほうに重点を置いたゲーム。
難易度Normalでもそこそこ難しく、全滅することもあるが、雰囲気はぴりぴりしてなくてよい。値段も考えるとフレンドと気軽にCOOPするにはよいゲーム。

One could argue that it can get a little repetive, but with 6 different character classes to level up, loads of maps and semi-regular content updates, its hard to argue that $10-$20 (depending if its on sale) isnt worth it. I'm easily bored, and I've racked up over 180 hours on this game...

Great game, has grown an unbelievable amount since launch with a TON, I mean TON!!! of free content.. To give you an example there were 4 or 6 guns.. now there are close to 15. 4 maps, now there are close to 15 as well. Not to mention player made maps. It has progression with leveling up specific classes that have a specific set of guns made just for that class and with each level your character improves.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR THE EXTREMELY LOW PRICE.

Fun game if you enjoy wave survival type shooters. Perk leveling is hard at times but it pays off in the end. The game has a good variety of weapons to satisfy most gamers and even though the gameplay seems repeatitive at times, it can be overlooked for the most part. The game is best however if you have at least one other person to play with and it is best with a full group of six players. Overall, I would recommend this game to fans of shooters and survival games.

An awesome multiplayer co-op first person zombie shooter. Many different types of specimen (aka zombies) with a boss at the end. Tons of maps and weapons too. Highly recommended as a game to play with your friends.

Immense amounts of fun to be had with this game. Even playing with absolute idiots is fun because it's great to see the last guy desperately trying to avoid death at every turn. When playing with people that know what they're doing, however, is when the game really shines. A great, long-lived community that is mostly friendly to new players and semi-frequent updates from Tripwire make the game one that you'll come back to months and months after you buy it.
